parameters.name: FuzzyMatching
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to support fuzzy match. Valid values:

*   false
*   true

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page.

parameters.name: PipelineIdentifier
parameters.description: The pipeline identifier. You can call **ListPipelines** to obtain the **identifier**.

parameters.name: PipelineProvider
parameters.description:
The pipeline provider.

*   The value is pai if the pipeline is provided by PAI.
*   The value is the ID of the Alibaba Cloud account if the pipeline is created by using the account.

parameters.name: WorkspaceId
parameters.description: The workspace ID. You can call [ListWorkspaces](~~449124~~) to obtain the workspace ID.
